name: Spacious 2BD with oversized windows, self-checkin
description:
Gorgeous 2BD/2BA Unit in the heart of Boston - Downtown. Professionally managed and cleaned with stylish kitchen, free high-speed wifi and 24/7 support. Fully stocked with all the convenience you would expect at a hotel.

Guest access
Located in the heart of Bostons financial district, you are just a couple blocks away from the Boston Common gardens and a short walk from the federal reserve plaza. Whether you are here for work or vacation, you will be centrally located between the west

Other things to note
Located right in the middle of the Downtown Boston's Theater district. Just a few minutes away from Logan International Airport and the Massachusetts State House. Aside from the T, other modes of transportation include, buses and boats to get around the area. The building itself boasts of history and classic charm which is perfect for travelers and professionals that are looking for a place that they can call home while in the city. Oversi
